author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-U.S. FDA Says Issued Order To Restrict Sale & Distribution Of Bayer's Essure Device
text:
April 9 (Reuters) - U.S. Food And Drug Administration:
* U.S. FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION SAYS ISSUED AN ORDER TO RESTRICT THE SALE AND DISTRIBUTION OF BAYERâ€™S ESSURE DEVICE
* NEW ESSURE LABELING RESTRICTS SALE TO HEALTH CARE PROVIDERS, FACILITIES THAT PROVIDE INFORMATION TO PATIENTS ABOUT RISKS, BENEFITS OF DEVICE
* DETERMINED THAT SOME WOMEN STILL ARE NOT RECEIVING INFORMATION ABOUT THE KNOWN RISKS OF ESSURE BEFORE IMPLANTATION Source text: ( bit.ly/2IGL9Fr ) Further company coverage:
